extendedInfo.description: DatPiff Mobile brings DatPiff's MASSIVE mixtape collection to you, wherever you are! You can also view videos, news, favorites and rate and comment on them all! Stream, search, comment, rate, download and favorite on the go!--If you have errors when upgrading, try removing and re-installing the app.Please be sure you have a strong connection. You are streaming full-size mp3 and video files!** Please note we are working on an update to the app to fix the streaming and downloading issues **

reviews.title: Downloading
reviews.comment: I have an LG Spectrum when I try to download any mixtape it only takes 10 secs but when I actually go to look at the downloads, the mixtape did not download (ex. 0.00 mb) is what shows. I use to have the HTC incred and it would work fine so i\'m guessing it\'s just the LG Spec.if you guys could fix this I would appreciate it. I love datpiff and would like to download mixtapes thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S
reviews.comment: Used to be fine, never had a problem until recently. After songs download they are unreadable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NEEDS FIXING
reviews.comment: It used to work and now it downloads the songs but it actually doesn\'t download the content. It says download complete but it shows 0/0mb downloaded. I just want to be able to download mixtapes and ACTUALLY listen to them. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t play or download ALL songs.
reviews.comment: Was working fine. Now it won\'t download all the songs I chose, and the ones it did \"download\" won\'t play! Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stops after log in
reviews.comment: Ive had an account with DatPiff for over 5 years and haven\'t had any problems with the app until now with me having a Note II and with At&t\'s new update to the software... every time I log in the app immediately freezes! I think DatPiff has some more updates they need to make because I love this app but they really need to fix this!
reviews.author: Christian Ramson

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: ..however I got a new phone now the files are unable to play even after I downloaded them again. Went from sprint Samsung moment to Sprint HTC Design
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Won\'t even let me download to my phone. Huuuuge disappointment! A$AP Ferg and Juicy J are here in 4 days!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for this app!
reviews.comment: Its a great application. I just don\'t like that it wakes my screen every time the track changes. Also, the UI could use a refresh. Other than that, I have no complaints. I don\'t like that you have to sign up to download but its something I can understand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update this app
reviews.comment: How dare you guys run freaking adds on an app you refuse to update. I have to restart it constantly. I would pay 50 bucks for the thing to work right so freaking annoying. Lazy greedy developers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Giving it four stars because it used to work perfectly. Please fix download complete errors on Galaxy SII.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work asap
reviews.comment: Used to work great but for three weeks haven\'t been able to dl. Says its 100% downloaded 0of0mb. This sucks and no one seems to care about fixing the bug. Come on man 3 weeks? Save the space on ur device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: The files wont play on my phone.. Download takes forever.. Then you cant even play it.. I would rate higher maybe a 10 if you fix this app.. And make a better icon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better if I Could Download Mixtapes
reviews.comment: This app is good if you just want to listen to songs but on my GS3 I can\'t download any songs/mixtapes it just starts off downloading but finishes in about 5 seconds and nothing is readable....
reviews.author: Jason Wandeloski

reviews.title: Droid Razor Max
reviews.comment: App worked well on old phone. Now it says download complete, but every file is 1kb & nothing has downloaded. Now this app is only good for browsing to see what new mixtapes are out. Hopefully this will get fixed soon & I can download songs again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I used to love this app. Now the songs don\'t download. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not downloading tracks!
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t even in to rap before I found out about datpiff. A few weeks ago I was able to download all the free mixtapes I wanted and now it says it downloads the whole album finishes in about a second, but when I go to the check the download it shows that 0 mb have downloaded.  Please fix asap, I need my gangsta musik!  S3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother!
reviews.comment: I was happy to get this app until it would only let me stream music and when I downloaded songs there would be data downloaded. Yeah datpiff y\'all need to just take this app off of da market. Or just tells in info that it is just for streaming. #DATWACK
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not satisfied so far
reviews.comment: I recently downloaded the app, made a profile, and attempted to download an album. I can listen to the songs after the buffering, but every time I proceed to download a window keeps popping up telling me that unfortunately the app has stopped working. :( I am not impressed at all by this app. It needs some updating.
reviews.author: Lauren Ellis

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It\'s good for listening but t he moment I tried to downoad I had to sign up which is ok but every time I try to enter my login and pass it force closes. ? HTC One LTE
reviews.author: Christopher Hawkins

reviews.title: DL problems
reviews.comment: It let\'s me download random, not all songs from a mixtape and then it won\'t let me play the song. Says wrong format. HTC one x
reviews.author: Collin Clatterbuck
